attributes.action: award John Mclaughlin a Knighthood for services to Music.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you know about John Mclaughlin you know he deserves a Knighthood. Sign Below.

rejection.details: Please refer to http://www.honours.gov.uk/ for details on how to nominate an individual for an honour
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
